programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg outplays New York real estate agent Ryan Serhant; Heather and Josh meet with a wedding planner who is baffled by their lack of preparation; David and James get a surprising response when they bring their client multiple bids.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman's client goes ballistic during a negotiation; rapper Tyga checks out David and James' bachelor pad in the Hollywood Hills; Josh Flagg goes back in time to sell a 1919 Beverly Hills tear-down that cannot be torn down.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: David makes a promise to a client without consulting James; the competition between Josh Altman and the Brits takes a disagreeable turn; Josh Flagg is surprised and saddened when Colton shows him the progress he's made remodeling his childhood home.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman searches for a home for a famous street artist who insists on going to every showing in disguise; Josh Flagg gets roped into finding a summer home for a friend in the Hamptons; James and David help old friends sell their home.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James and David hatch a plan to impress a hard-nosed client who used to be a topnotch real estate agent; Josh Flagg gets a listing for one of his favorite properties; Josh Altman lands a listing for a property known as "the Western White House."

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: A potential client pressures Josh Altman and his brother to find the perfect getaway in just two days; Josh Flagg's state of mind makes it difficult to sell a beachfront property; James and David stand to lose millions of dollars.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman puts his relationship with Heather on the back burner when his idol, Daymond John ("Shark Tank"), hires him to find commercial space for his headquarters; David and James coax a developer and his wife to sell their dream house.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: A Laguna Beach listing forces the Brits to sink-or-swim in a new territory; Josh Flagg struggles to stay focused on a new listing for one of Edith's friends; Josh Altman finds himself at a crossroads.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James finds himself sitting across the table from publisher Larry Flynt; Josh Altman fields an offer at an inopportune time; David and Adrian make a decision about their future; Josh Flagg finds a beach house for a hard-to-please client.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James and David's exclusive dinner party takes a turn when Josh Altman and James have an altercation on the rooftop; a deadline looms for the Brits; Josh Flagg convinces his boyfriend, Colton, it's time to sell their Sunset Strip home.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Still sore, David keeps James out of a deal with a mystery client; Josh Flagg tries to unload a teardown property; Josh Altman strives to win over a new client while enduring pressure from his visiting parents to have children.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: David's sobriety is tested at a Burning Man-style open house; Josh Altman faces off against an intimidating client; Josh Flagg helps two developers sell an overpriced West Hollywood home, and he helps James get revenge on Josh Altman.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg gets creative when marketing a $20 million listing in Trousdale Estates; James and David finally gain access to the Beachwood party pad; Josh Altman is determined to sell a house designed by architect Wallace Neff to the right buyer.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James' family commitments get in the way of a listing with a demanding client; Josh Altman strives to increase the value of an overpriced estate; when Josh Flagg and the Brits join forces, Josh Altman seizes on a chance to get his revenge.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman's prank on Josh Flagg leads to a confrontation that turns personal; James pulls off a sentimental surprise for his wife on their 5-year anniversary; Josh Altman confesses to a change of heart in regards to his future with Heather.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: When NBA player Kris Humphries shows an interest in James and David's listing, the Brits seek to steal the deal; MLB player Brian Wilson makes quirky demands, throwing Josh Altman off his game; Josh Flagg's client has a tiny budget.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James works with Madison Hildebrand to find a home in Malibu for a British millionaire who has a fear of heights; Josh Flagg struggles to move on after losing his grandmother, Edith; Josh Altman and the Brits engage in an epic negotiation session.

programme.desc: Josh Flagg is tempted by a listing in the Pacific Palisades; Madison Hildebrand shows up at Josh Altman's open house; an investor goes shopping for a new hotel on the Sunset Strip; James tries to convince Adrian to put her dream home on the market.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman and Josh Flagg have an explosive showdown; Madison works against the clock to close the deal on his PCH listing; David enlists James' help to deal with the sale of his own home; Josh Altman celebrates the launch of his book.

programme.desc: Heather's pregnancy test puts things into perspective for Josh Altman; James and David may walk away from the St. Ives listing; Josh Flagg shifts his focus to a personal issue; David heads off to Italy to pop the question to Adrian.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg plays mentor to a teenage buyer with an eight million dollar budget; Josh Altman lists a sleek hillside home at a price off-putting to his punk drummer client; David Parnes and James Harris chase a $45,000,000 estate in Holmby Hills.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg's teenage client falls for Josh Altman's multi-million-dollar listing in the Bird Streets enclave, leading to the agents facing off at the negotiating table; James and David's big listing begins to slip away.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman lists a stunning modern home with a $2 million-dollar closet, but his client refuses every offer; Josh Flagg takes an Internet mogul shopping for a fixer-upper to flip; David copes with a devastating family issue.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Madison's easy beachfront sale becomes jeopardized when his client works with another agent; Josh Flagg's historical party pad attracts eyes, but no offers; Josh Altman has a hard time keeping two Santa Monica listings straight.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman finds himself caught between his fiancée and his client; Josh Flagg struggles to attract a buyer for his historic hilltop listing; James and David cannot see eye-to-eye on a price for their sexy, contemporary listing.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: While preparing to get married, Josh and Heather face off in a negotiation that could keep them from walking down the aisle; James and David try to bury the hatchet when they have a chance at shattering the sales record in Culver City.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg lists a mid-century modern and must fight off developers who want to bulldoze it; Josh and Heather return home from their wedding to find their dream house; James and David are asked to help a developer who previously rejected them.

programme.desc: David and James throw a party as a last ditch effort to sell their St. Ives listing; Josh and Matt Altman list Wes Craven's turnkey canyon hideaway, and they are overwhelmed by the offers flooding in; Josh Flagg works to close a deal on his listing.
